bibl.title: The Authorship of the Comoedia Dukiana.
bibl.note: P. Duke Inv. F1984.1 [ed.: William H. WILLIS, Comoedia Dukiana, GRBS 32 (1991) pp. 331-353 et 4 pll.]. "In the editio princeps Willis does mention Archippus as a possible author and he refers to my support for this attribution, but the evidence for this case needs still to be fully presented."
CSAPO Eric, The Authorship of the Comoedia Dukiana.
